snippet: An annual defense paper warns of the increasing possibility of a military confrontation with China and the danger of North Korea’s growing nuclear capability.
abstract: Japan warns in government report of potential military confrontation with China over maritime disputes and raises alarm over North Korea's growing nuclear capability; also expresses concern that United States is losing focus on East Asia.
lead_paragraph: An annual defense paper warns of the increasing possibility of a military confrontation with China and the danger of North Korea’s growing nuclear capability.

headline.main: Japan Warns of China and North Korea as Security Threats
